dt2.12:1.3_0: saṅkhārakkhandhena ye dhammā sampayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.12:1.4_0: Te dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:1.6_0: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:2.6_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:2.8_0: Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:3.3_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:3.5_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.12:6.4_0: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.12:16.5_0: ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.12:16.6_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.12:19.4_0: Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:20.2_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:20.4_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:21.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:21.2_0: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:21.3_0: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:21.9_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:21.11_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:22.2_0: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:22.3_0: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.12:22.4_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:22.6_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:23.1_0: Sahetukehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:23.2_0: hetusampayuttehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:23.3_0: na hetusahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.12:23.4_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:23.6_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:24.2_0: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:24.3_0: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.12:24.4_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:24.6_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:25.1_0: Āsavasampayuttehi ceva no ca āsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.12:25.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:25.4_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:26.7_0: parāmāsehi ceva parāmaṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.12:26.8_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:26.10_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:27.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:27.4_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:28.2_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:28.4_0: Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:29.7_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:29.9_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:30.3_0: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:30.4_0: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:30.5_0: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.12:30.6_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:30.8_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:31.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:31.2_0: kilesasampayuttehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:31.8_0: upekkhāsahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.12:31.9_0: Te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:31.11_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
